layer.name: Responsibility
layer.definition: If it's in your life, it's yours to address.

questions.text: I take responsibility for what I consume mentally — content, media, and information are my choices.
I own that my thinking patterns are mine to change — I'm not a passive victim of my thoughts.
I don't blame my education, background, or intelligence for my current state of knowledge or ignorance.
questions.principle: No excuses for lack of learning

questions.text: I recognize that learning and intellectual growth are my responsibility — it's not someone else's job to educate me.
I take ownership of protecting my mind from influences that harm my thinking, rather than blaming the influences themselves.
